overview: No matter how hard he tries, James (Ryan Jordan) can't shake the memories of his sexual encounters with his future brother-in-law Calvin. Since Calvin caught James cheating on Sarah (April Olsen), he stayed true to his word and used the video of James' infidelity as collateral to get whatever he wants. But that's not where the story ends. Calvin is generous and shares information of James' cheating with Calvin's cousin Leo (Chris Damned). He also tells Leo what a good boy James is under the circumstances. Knowing he has leverage, Leo makes a move to get the sexual satisfaction he craves.
title: Playdate: The Good Boy
